Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 teenage boys staying plenty boy wrong king sized bed pull couch close wall pulled impossible trying restroom bed door wrong privacy breakfast sparse boys enjoyed own waffles

Reviews.Title: “Nice place and convenient to Strip!”
Reviews.Author: travel4me_9296
Reviews.Content: stayed weekend saturday sunday night stays avoid rates hotels strip shuttle takes strip rental car easy access interstates strip hotel mandalay bay closest strip hotel easy drive airport hotel clean breakfast nice kept food stocked enjoyed jimmy dean sausage biscuits typical fairfield inn checkin fast front desk staff nice rates reasonable reasonable using marriott consider staying

Reviews.Title: “Good Alternative To The Strip”
Reviews.Author: Wienerfish
Reviews.Content: looking decent hotel near strip found fairfield inn located i15 southern las vegas blvd near mandalay bay hotel reasonable rates amenities found front desk staff extremely helpful excellent choice avoid crowds street traffic

Reviews.Title: “Good experience”
Reviews.Content: hotel bad attitude found minute shuttle airport greeted ryan pleasant courteous keys quickly checked information breakfast shuttle schedule found average definitely clean bed comfortable overly towels definitely skimpy pantene shampoo conditioner breakfast buffet staffed lovely lady hard food replenished guests happy muffins assortment bagels etc check breeze staff actually acted cared recommend hotel quick stay cab fare 20 dollars airport 9 dollar shuttle

Reviews.Content: disappointed stay bed ancient decor staying grandmas toilet ran night hotel extremely noisy slamming door freeway outside window flying overhead king size bed received queens

Reviews.Title: “comfy bed, nice pillows, good breakfast, and convenient shuttle service”

Reviews.Content: located close mandalay bay centre vegas strip hotel smell smoke nice mattresses pillows housekeeping ad breakfast nice waffles yogurt breads cereals fruit nice assortment hot cold beverages tv nice wifi nicely time water pressure shower head 5 settings heating system noisy hotel shuttle locations strip free plus free trip airport staff friendly corteous checkin quick comfortable stay

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 marriott hotels dean martin drive typically stay night driving location hotels easy freeway dont deal strip close hotel shuttle van recent visit weeks ago disappointed hotel am management hotel looking carpet hallway frayed stained clean worn half bad near airport hotel marriott standard

Reviews.Title: “Off the Strip but good”

Reviews.Content: nice hotel mariott properties stands little separated strip hotel offers complimentary drop hour mandalay bay hotel mgm grand easily accessible staff friendly helpful stay weekend strip hotels pricey

Reviews.Title: “Amazing STAFF and GREAT BEDS!”
Reviews.Author: dmstein
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights girls weekend getaway rate wasnt necessarily spacious considering las vegas strip daynight didnt mind favorite hotel exceptional front desk agents ryan jeff sooo helpful sooo welcoming ryan checked laid genuine top front desk agents helpful sweet add additional friends check process smoothly friends able close night night clubbing 5am jeff night auditor sooo friendly looked hot mess sent muffins complimentary breakfast hadnt started overall trip perfect especially beacause staff comfy beds fairfield inn suites las vegas thanks pleasurable stay ive stayed hotel times soon

Reviews.Title: “Another Great Stay at a Fairfield Inn”
Reviews.Author: vegasbaby1957
Reviews.Content: spent night hotel excellent 3rd 4th stay location check service exceptional front desk employee feel welcome spacious clean complementary breakfast nice recommend hotel stay strip

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Service and Great Accomadations”
Reviews.Author: ABC32655
Reviews.Content: fairfield inn suites south las vegas stay business traveler vacationer service outstanding questions possibly answered knowledgable assist breakfast stay everytime travel las vegas feel rested leave

Reviews.Title: “Good Value and Great Location”
Reviews.Author: awenzl
Reviews.Content: stayed nights business found accommodations quiet clean comfortable overall value shuttle service runs hourly hotel mgm mandalay bay 7am 12pm prior notice airport mall service breakfast buffet generous offered healthy options eg hardboiled eggs yogurt cereal complementary coffee available day stay money location

Reviews.Content: stayed marriot associate 35night rate ac centralized loud cant adjust fan speed noisy cold 312 sink clogged severely couple tiles broken bathroom wall tub ventilation bathroom bed soft offthestrip location south skipped lot traffic towels werent quality absorbent

Reviews.Content: attending trade convention mandalay bay stay smokiness casinos hotel ideal shuttle service convention hall transport glad shuttle service town square shopping mall south strip mgm grand shuttle service ran till midnight grateful attend evening business cocktails mandalay hotel free wifi free drinks outdoor pool buffet breakfast happy stay
